languages.text: {n}Завороженный ответом, Паскаль тихо изрекает:{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл".
{n}Fascinated by the answer, Pasqal says quietly,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."
languages.original_text: {n}Завороженный ответом, Паскаль тихо изрекает:{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл".

traits.locale_text: {n}Fascinated by the answer, Pasqal says quietly,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

languages.text: {n}返答に興味をかき立てられたパスカルは静かに告げる。{/n}「サイクルを断ち切れ」
languages.original_text: {n}Fascinated by the answer, Pasqal says quietly,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}返答に興味をかき立てられたパスカルは静かに告げる。{/n}「サイクルを断ち切れ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡被这个答案迷住了，他静静地开了口。{/n}“让循环终止吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Fascinated by the answer, Pasqal says quietly,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡被这个答案迷住了，他静静地开了口。{/n}“让循环终止吧。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Fasciné par cette réponse, Pasqal murmure :{/n} « Que le Cycle soit interrompu. »
languages.original_text: {n}Fascinated by the answer, Pasqal says quietly,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Fasciné par cette réponse, Pasqal murmure :{/n} « Que le Cycle soit interrompu. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Fascinado por su respuesta, Pasqal dice en voz baja:{/n} «Deje que el Ciclo se interrumpa».
languages.original_text: {n}Fascinated by the answer, Pasqal says quietly,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Fascinado por su respuesta, Pasqal dice en voz baja:{/n} «Deje que el Ciclo se interrumpa».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Fasziniert von der Antwort sagt Pasqal leise:{/n} "Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde."
languages.original_text: {n}Fascinated by the answer, Pasqal says quietly,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Fasziniert von der Antwort sagt Pasqal leise:{/n} "Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bu yanıt karşısında büyülenen Pasqal, sessizce konuşuyor.{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun."
languages.original_text: {n}Fascinated by the answer, Pasqal says quietly,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu yanıt karşısında büyülenen Pasqal, sessizce konuşuyor:{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
